title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 4 - Public Accommodation Offices, Adjoining Facilities, and Adjacent Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 4 - Public Accommodation Offices, Adjoining Facilities, and Adjacent Facilities

State Regulations
§ 4.1 - General statement, version 3
§ 4.2 - Adjoining or adjacent facilities, version 3
§ 4.3 - Existence of public accommodation office not considered in evaluating application for full-service branch, version 3

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, General, Supervisory Policy 4

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §195

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
